info.title: Geolocation
info.description: This class uses GeoIP php extension to get information about country codes and timezones based on the ip address. This version is not working for detailed timezones where there might be more in a country.

method.name: getTimezoneByIP
method.description: Get the corresponding timezone according to ip address.

parameter.name: $ipAddress
parameter.description: The ip address. Leave empty to get the current remote address. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: The timezone corresponding to the given ip.

method.name: getCountryCode2ByIP
method.description: Get the country ISO2A code by ip.

parameter.name: $ipAddress
parameter.description: The ip address. Leave empty to get the current remote address. It is empty by default.

method.name: getCountryCode3ByIP
method.description: Get the country ISO3A code by ip.

parameter.name: $ipAddress
parameter.description: The ip address. Leave empty to get the current remote address. It is empty by default.
